translation: This is a cloud above Fengxian and there is nothing abnormal about it.
transcript: 这是采自于奉贤上空的一朵云，这朵云呢其实没什么问题。

translation: Just imagine what if this very common cloud is composed of various questions.
transcript: 但是如果它是由问题组成的。

translation: Here we may as well call it the “QCloud” as in a cloud of questions.
transcript: 可能我们可以称之为问题云。

translation: This is a picture of the brain.
transcript: 这是一张大脑的图片。

translation: Look closely, you will find that the cloud resembles the brain to some extent.
transcript: 大家仔细看一看你会发现，云的图片和脑的图片有某一种神似。

translation: But do you know that to make such a cloud artificially – even though it can be seen every day – is an arduous work.
transcript: 但是你们知道吗，如果让我们人工做出一朵云来是不是能做到，尽管我们每天都可以看到白云，其实是很艰难的。

translation: As another example, we meet many people every day so we have seen brains everyday, yet can we build a brain manually?
transcript: 那再比如说，我们也每天看到很多很多人，每个人的头里面都有一个大脑，但是能不能人工做出一个大脑来呢？

translation: Unfortunately, it is more formidable.
transcript: 这是更加艰难的一件事情。

translation: During the last decade, a research team was obsessed with brain simulation.
transcript: 但是在最近十年来有一个研究团队，对于模拟大脑产生了浓厚的兴趣。

translation: This is Chris Eliasmith, a neuroscientist from the University of Waterloo, Canada.
transcript: 这是来自于加拿大滑铁卢大学的神经科学家。

translation: He has builte a project called Spaun.
transcript: 那么Chris呃 Eliasmith他曾经做了一个叫spaun计划。

translation: In the project, he built the simulation of a functioning brain with 2.5 million simulated neurons.
transcript: 在这个计划当中，他用250万个神经元连在一起，构成了一个虚拟的大脑。

translation: This brain is able to complete a series of tasks – from simple reasoning, to drawing and to some precise calculations.
transcript: 这个大脑能够进行简单的推理，能够进行绘画，还能够做一些精确的计算。

translation: Henry Markram, the founder of Blue Brain Project, who is more passionate about brain simulation than Chris, has led a project much more challenging.
transcript: 但是比他更疯狂的是蓝脑计划的创始人叫Henry，Henry他曾经做了一个更加具有挑战意义的。

translation: As he claimed, the project would create a simulation of the entire human brain within a decade.
transcript: 他说我要花十年的时间，来制造一个完全可以跟人的大脑相媲美的一个人工脑。

translation: On January 23, 2013, the European Union funded the Project to the tune of 1 billion euros.
transcript: 对于这一个脑计划呢是在2013年1月23日的时候，欧盟给他提供了十亿欧元的资助。

translation: Such a project is also known as "the space plan"in the sector of artificial intelligence.
transcript: 对于这样一个计划来说呢，被称为是人工智能领域的登天计划。

translation: While I am thinking that the brains of everyone here are actually evolved from a prototype 100,000 years ago, and the recorded history of human civilization is merely 10,000 years.
transcript: 但是我在想，我们在座的每个人头脑中的大脑，它其实现在进化到现在应该来说是10万年前有一个雏形，真正人的具有文明可以考察的历史呢是1万年。

translation: Each human brain, weighing about 1.4kg, is made up of 86 billion nerve cells.
transcript: 在座每一个每个人大脑中呢大约就是在二点八斤左右，有860亿个神经细胞组成的这样一个大脑。

translation: Why do people spend so much time building a virtual electronic brain?
transcript: 为什么人们要花很多时间去帮它做出来一个虚拟的电子大脑呢？

translation: Then let us step back and think more objectively, even if such brain is built ultimately, it is no more than an individual creation.
transcript: 那么倒过来想一想，也许这个大脑即使做成啦，它也就是一个独立的大脑而已。

translation: There are almost 600 of you here today and if we assume that the average brain age of everyone here is 30 years old, then we will possess 18,000 years of brain age, which is 80 million years more than the entire human civilization.
transcript: 但是大家想一想，我们在座的今天到这个会场的观众，有将近六六百人，这六百个人，每个人的大脑如果说平均年龄是三十岁的话，那我们就有1.8万年的这个脑龄，这1.8万年的脑龄比我们整个人类的文明史还要多出8000万年。

translation: Therefore, the knowledge system embodied in this venue is rather large and complete.
transcript: 所以说在我们这个会场里面的知识体系呀，是一个非常庞大的、非常完善的知识体系。

translation: What if we connect every brain in the hall?
transcript: 如果说我们把我们这个大厅里面的每一个大脑都联网，将会怎么样？

translation: Here I propose a new plan, a "Connected Human Brain Project".
transcript: 所以我今天提出了一个新的计划：人类联脑工程。

translation: So, is it possible for the brain to be connected together?
transcript: 那么到底大脑能不能连在一起呢？

translation: Many of us here may work as teachers.
transcript: 我们在座的可能很多是老师。

translation: If every teacher here had been engaged in teaching for ten years, then we would have 6,000 years of teaching experience.
transcript: 如果说我们每个老师的教龄是10年，那么在场的这些老师，那就有六千年的这个教龄。

translation: Even if Confucius is still alive, he would only earn 2,500 years of that.
transcript: 那么孔夫子到活到现在也就是两千五百年左右。

translation: Provided that all the teachers unite to do something for education, how powerful the brain would be?
transcript: 那么这时候如果说我们所有的老师一起来为教育做一件事情，这样的大脑会是该有多么强大。

translation: Therefore, I reckon that the connected brain project may be more realistic than a virtual brain project.
transcript: 所以我认为联脑工程，可能比虚拟脑工程更加具有现实意义。

translation: Next, I will briefly demonstrate the feasibility and necessity of the connected brain project.
transcript: 那么联脑工程啊，它的可行性和必要性我接下来可以简单论证一下。

translation: How do we connect human brains together?
transcript: 我觉得，就是怎么样能够把人的大脑连在一起呢？

translation: In the past, such demanding task may be done through indirect communication.
transcript: 过去我们看来是很难做的，但是我们可以通过间接地沟通。

translation: For instance, when I write a book, whoever read the work will enter my thinking space.
transcript: 比如说我写一本儿书，其他人来看这本儿书，于是你就进入我的思维空间啦。

translation: As it comes to the era of mobile Internet, it seems to be much easier to connect human brains together.
transcript: 而现在这种移动互联时代呢，我觉得把脑联起来变得好像容易多了。

translation: People are able to talk and communicate with each other by telephone, all these lay a solid technical foundation for human being to implement a connected brain project.
transcript: 因为我们可以打手机，我们也可以彼此通话，这些都是让我们脑联网的一个非常重要的技术基础，为整个人类的实现联脑工程提供了技术的可能性。

translation: The first question for a connected brain project is that we need to create a “QCloud” first.
transcript: 所以联脑工程首先的问题就是要创造一个问题云。

translation: Our brains may be connected when all of us here think about the same question.
transcript: 如果说我们在座的所有的各位听众，都能够思考同一个问题的时候，也许我们的脑就联网啦。

translation: Then if we use one connected brain to ponder all the questions, a so-called "QCloud" would be created.
transcript: 那么这样啊，如果所有的问题我们用一个大脑来思考，这时候我们称之为问题云就产生啦。

translation: Such a “QCloud” should contain elements like cloud storage, cloud computing, cloud processing, cloud sharing and cloud push.
transcript: 这样的问题云应该包含这些要素，比如说它要包含云存储、云计算、云处理，还有云分享、云推送。

translation: In which what matters most is that clouds can interact with each other.
transcript: 当然这里面最核心的是要这个云之间的问题，彼此之间要能够相互作用。

translation: At present, the connection between knowledge has been streamlined by our knowledge engineers, which may greatly boost the evolution and development of the cloud itself.
transcript: 所以现在我们的知识工程师，已经可以让知识之间的关联变得更加便捷，它可以促进云本身的一种进化和发展。

translation: In this context, it will be much easier for a “QCloud” to be built when myriad people use the connected brain to think.
transcript: 所以这时候就可以让无数的人用同一个大脑来进行思考，这时候我们说问题云就产生啦。

translation: Now let me share a simple case to introduce how the “QCloud” will be realized.
transcript: 那么关于问题云啊，我给大家分享一个简单案例看看到底怎么样能够实现。

translation: I once led my students to carry out a research.
transcript: 比如说我曾经带着学生去开展研究。

translation: On what?
transcript: 他们是在研究什么呢？

translation: The ants.
transcript: 研究蚂蚁。

translation: Three students were interested in ants, so what about ants that interested them?
transcript: 这三位同学对于蚂蚁的什么感兴趣？

translation: They wanted to know what did a ant nest look like.
transcript: 他非常想知道这个蚂蚁窝是长什么样的。

translation: The ant nest we usually see is just a small hole, so they post the question on the platform of "Qcloud", "Who knows the structure of a ant nest?"
transcript: 我们平时看到的蚂蚁窝只是一个小孔，所以他们就在这个问题云这个空间里面哪，就发布了他自己的课题：有谁知道蚂蚁窝的构造？

translation: Some other students were not interested in ant nests so they were thinking about a different question.
transcript: 那么另外一些同学呢，他们不是对于蚂蚁窝感兴趣，他们就在想另外一个问题。

translation: They pondered whether the nests built by the same ants were identical or whether ant nests will differ when they were built by different ants.
transcript: 说是不是同样的蚂蚁做出来的窝都是一样的，或者说不同的蚂蚁它的窝是不是都是会有区别呢？

translation: So they also submitted the question on the "Qcloud".
transcript: 所以他们也在这个问题云上发表了自己的问题。

translation: There was another group a students who focused on what kind of environment ants favored, whether it was dry or wet, and what kind of temperature.
transcript: 除此之外第三组同学，他们是要研究的对象是，蚂蚁喜欢什么样的生存环境，喜欢是干燥的还是湿润的，喜欢什么样的温度。

translation: Such questions were also posted on the platform.
transcript: 所以他们也这样的问题呢，也发布在这个云平台上。

translation: As an increasing number of such questions were posted, the cloud platform would collect all the ant-related questions on each terminal and pushe them to teachers or students interested in this topic.
transcript: 这样越来越多的问题啊都发布上去之后，结果，这个云平台呢就在各个终端上把所有与蚂蚁有关的问题汇集在一起，并且把这个问题推送给他的老师，或者推送给其他感兴趣的同学。

translation: Then a "Qcloud" has taken shape.
transcript: 于是这样一个问题云就初步形成了雏形。

translation: In return, more and more teachers as well as students post their questions about ants on the platform.
transcript: 所以越来越多的同学、越来越多的老师，就把他们对于蚂蚁有关的问题哪全部都抛上去。

translation: On this platform, we can see someone may be absorbed in the behaviors of ants such as how ants move their nests, why ants fight and queue up.
transcript: 大家可以看到有的人对于蚂蚁的行为感兴趣，蚂蚁这个搬家的时候到底怎么搬的，蚂蚁为什么会打仗，为什么还要排等等。

translation: While others may be fascinated by the structure of ant nests like how the nests' property management work.
transcript: 另外一些同学呢可能会对于这个蚂蚁的建筑感兴趣，比如说他会了解这个蚂蚁窝到底怎样进行物业管理的。

translation: When numerous questions were raised collectively, a ant-themed "Qcloud" took form.
transcript: 等等这样很多很多的问题汇集在一起，于是我们整个与蚂蚁有关的问题云就形成啦。

translation: By virtue of the “QCloud”, students are able to share their questions, researches and data with each other, thus accelerating the development of ant-related researches.
transcript: 这些问题云哪就会让很多的同学彼此在这个平台上相互分享自己的问题，分享自己的研究，分享自己的数据，然后他们共同地推动与蚂蚁相关的研究向前发展。

translation: With constant upgrading on its own, the "QCloud" may become a brain shared by lots of people.
transcript: 这时候我们说这个问题云就在不断地自身在进化，它就可能变成很多人一起共用的一个大脑。

translation: That is a "Qcloud".
transcript: 这就是问题云。

translation: The born of the "QCloud" and the knowledge that came with it have brought up a new question: Can we turn it into an "Innovation storm" that prospers the industry.
transcript: 那么这个问题云哪我们知道，它带来的知识抛出一个问题，事实上它能不能变成泽润万物的一个创新雨呢？

translation: As educators, we do hope to turn this cloud technology or the “QCloud” into an educational process, which is also the born of an "Innovation storm".
transcript: 所以我们作为我们教育工作者就希望把这一个云技术或者把这个问题云变成一个教育的过程，所以这时候把它课程化的过程就是创新雨的形成过程。

translation: With respect to this issue, MOORs offer a technical model for the transformation from the “QCloud” to an “Innovation storm”.
transcript: 在这方面MOORs为问题云向创新雨的转化提供了一种技术形态。

translation: What are MOORs?
transcript: MOORs是什么呢？

translation: You may have never heard of it, but MOOR is short for Massive Open Online Research.
transcript: MOORs大家可能第一次听说，但是它呢全称是Massive Open Online Researches。

translation: It is a massive online research and development open access platform.
transcript: 是大规模的、在线的、开放的研究性学习。

translation: In 2003, Professor Pavel Pevzner of the University of California in San Diego launched for the first time a course dedicated to bioinformatics studies through a platform called Coursera.
transcript: 它就在2013年的之后，由加州大学圣地亚哥分校的帕威尔教授第一次在Coursera平台上推出了一个，用于研究的一个叫生物信息学。

translation: You may be not familiar with MOOR, however, I bet you are acquainted with MOOCS or the massive open online courses.
transcript: 我说的这个MOOR可能大家不熟悉，但是我说MOOCS大家都肯定都很清楚,也就是我们说的MOOC课程。

translation: Generally, there are three platforms for MOOC.
transcript: 对于MOOC课程来说呢，它是有三个平台。

translation: It was Professor Pavel who first claimed that the platform was designed to conduct researches rather than disseminating knowledge, that’s why he renamed it as MOOR.
transcript: 而帕威尔教授呢他第一次提出我们这个平台不是用来传递知识的，而是这种一起用来一起开展研究，所以他就提出叫MOOR。

translation: MOOR is different from MOOC, yet they are connected to each other.
transcript: 这个MOOR和MOOCS之间呢它们是有区别的，但又有联系的。

translation: Here is a brief explanation.
transcript: 所以呢我对它做一个简单的区分。

translation: Most people are familiar with Mooc.
transcript: 对于MOOC来说它是很多人都比较熟悉的。

translation: In terms of the content, it often presents existed problems, with more focus the reproduction of a course; while MOOR emphasizes thinking about new and unknown problems.
transcript: 就是它更多的从内容上来看，它是着眼于一门课程的内容的一种再现，往往是一种老问题；而MOORs呢它更多的是对一种新问题的对于未知问题的一种思考。

translation: MOOC focuses on inheritance and construction, yet MOOR highlights innovation and development.
transcript: MOOCs侧重于传承和建构，而MOOR更侧重于创新和发展。

translation: MOOC centers on receptive learning while MOOR gives priority to research-based study.
transcript: MOOCs呢它以接受性学习为主，而MOOR它是以研究性学习为主。

translation: Fourthly, MOOC attaches great importance to the results.
transcript: 第四个就是MOOCs非常重视结果。

translation: As we all know, MOOC adopts the mode of high-selection and high-exclusion.
transcript: 大家知道MOOCs现在它是高选择高淘汰。

translation: It is very likely that only a few hundred out of 100,000 people pass the final test of the course as the definite answers to questions account for a relatively large proportion.
transcript: 十万人去学习这个课程，最后考出来的可能只有几百人，它是主要是对于这个问题往往是有确定答案的比较多一些。

translation: However, MOOR centered on the research-based study.
transcript: 而对于MOOR来说呢它是往往是以研究性学习为主。

translation: It lays more emphasis on the research process rather than the inheritance of the past knowledge.
transcript: 推动的是一种研究过程而不在于对于过去知识的一种传承。

translation: Therefore it is more research-oriented.
transcript: 因此它是更加侧重研究的。

translation: Fifthly, MOOC has clear assessment objectives for most time.
transcript: 第五个，MOOCs它一般有明确的考核目标。

translation: You pass the course when meeting the correspondent demands.
transcript: 你达到这个什么什么要求啦，算你这门课过关啦。

translation: Whereas with a major emphasis on the process of innovation, MOOR is more about a in-depth and evolving journey, without a fixed objective.
transcript: 而MOOR呢它更加地强调这个创新的过程，它往往是一种深层的，发展的，没有一个固定的终点。

translation: These are the major differences between MOOC and MOOR.
transcript: 这是MOOCs和MOOR的区别。

translation: Why MOOR is of great value to our education?
transcript: 那么这个MOOR为什么对于我们的教育有价值呢？

translation: Maybe we can analyze this from the perspective of human cognition.
transcript: 它实际上就我们可以从人类的认知学的角度来进行一个分析。

translation: For human cognition and the known world, namely how humans pass the knowledge of our ancestors to futur generations, we call it the known world because there are answers known.
transcript: 对于人类的认知来说，对于已知世界，也就是说我们人类怎么样把前人所获取的知识传递给后人，这个我们称之为已知世界，也就是答案空间，有答案的。

translation: The knowledge teachers hold is merely of subset and the teachers would like to impart all their acquired knowledge to the students.
transcript: 老师掌握的是其中的一其中的一个子集，而老师希望把自己的知识全部给学生。

translation: In the last year alone, the figure of newly established Internet education companies reached 2.5 every day.
transcript: 所以最近就去年一年统计下来啊，每天大概有2.5个互联网教育公司产生。

translation: Most of the enterprises are obsessed with teaching methods – how to pass knowledge on to students more effectively, how to make students understand on a more thorough and solid basis – with a view to earn higher test scores.
transcript: 它们大部分都在研究怎么样教，怎么样能够把知识更好地传递给学生，能够让学生理解得更彻底，更加扎实，从而考试考得好一些。

translation: However, they barely touched the unknown sector.
transcript: 所以他们很少去研究对于未知领域来看怎么办。

translation: As we all know, it is impossible to understand the unknown world with educational courses alone, so scientific inquiry activities are bound to be implemented.
transcript: 对于未知的世界，我们知道简单地通过教育活动是无法实现的，所以必须要进行科学探究活动。

translation: The problems faced by MOOR or "QCloud" are exactly the unknown world.
transcript: 而MOOR或者说问题云所面临的问题就往往是那些未知世界。

translation: It is our hope that, all people could make concerted effort to study and explore the unknown world.
transcript: 对于这些问题来说呢，我们希望让它能够让所有的人围绕未知世界的问题一起来进行研究探索。

translation: MOOR is just designed for such courses.
transcript: 所以这就是MOOR它所应对的课程。

translation: In this regard, MOORs are particularly valuable for basic education in China.
transcript: 对于这一点来说呢，MOORs对于我们中国的基础教育我显得显得尤其具有价值。

translation: Look at this picture.
transcript: 我们觉得有这么些，比如说，这是这是一个图片。

translation: A pupil at grade five wrote “Baidu knows” on the answer sheet for the problem he felt elusive so he wrote "Baidu knows".
transcript: 这是一个小学五年级的图片，这个孩子在做题的时候呢他不会，他就说百度一下你就知道。

translation: Surprisingly, he got a full mark for the question because technically the answer itself is correct.
transcript: 关键是这个老师还给他打对了，因为他这句话本身没错。

translation: We can know the answer by virtue of Baidu search.
transcript: 百度一下确实可以知道。

translation: For instance, “What is the role of the root”, we can baidu the answer.
transcript: 比如说“根有什么作用？”，百度一下，能找到答案。

translation: Yet, if the answers to all the test questions prepared by the teacher can be filled after you baidu them, the examination paper itself is not as challenging as it should be.
transcript: 但是如果说一个老师出的所有的题目，都是百度一下你就知道的答案，你就知道了题目，那个这个试卷本身的它的挑战性呢就大打折扣。

translation: Therefore, for human being, we hope to organize the students to study in a more creative manner.
transcript: 所以，对于人类来说呢，我们希望能够用一种更加新颖的方式来组织学生学习。

translation: Against this backdrop, the "Qcloud" is endowed with unique value.
transcript: 所以在这种情况下呢，就是问题云，它就有了就是独特的价值。

translation: Just upload the most complicated and arduous questions to the cloud.
transcript: 我们把人类最复杂的问题，最难以解决的问题都统统放到云端。

translation: Let's say everyone here proposes one question, then we will get 600 questions in total.
transcript: 我们在座的每一位听众如果都提出一个问题，那就有600个问题。

translation: If every question is of some sort of value, we will obtain 600 good questions.
transcript: 这600个问题当中，如果每一个问题都是好问题，那就有600个好问题。

translation: Provided that each good question is able to draw attention of 60,000 brains, the entire society will exercise all-round innovation and the era of mass innovation is just ahead.
transcript: 这600个好问题如果在每一个问题里面再吸引6万个人参加，那我们整个社会的创新，就万众创新的时代就可能变成现实。

translation: For it is shown that the more attention a question gains, the more possible it will have breakthroughs.
transcript: 所以我们知道，如果说一个问题关注的人越多，它就会越容易产生突破。

translation: Just as the case of Taobao that was not well-received in the early stage and grew up in the buzz.
transcript: 如果说就像我们知道最早的时候这个淘宝一开始也是很烂的，它是在骂声中长大的。

translation: Nevertheless, it is a very good way to attract swarms of consumers to put forward their doubts, questions and complaints on the platform.
transcript: 其实与其说是被骂，它其它实际上是用一个非常好的方式就吸引很多的消费者，把你们感到疑惑的问题、讨厌的问题、吐槽的问题全部放到平平台上，然后让我知道。

translation: Eventually, Taobao becomes a fairly perfect on-line shopping system.
transcript: 最终把这个淘宝呢变成一个非常完善的一个购物系统。

translation: By the same token, if everyone here posts your most vexing problems on the cloud, such problems may attract some solutions from various areas.
transcript: 同样道理，如果说我们人类，我们在座的各位把你们觉得最烦的问题通通放到云上去，也许就会吸引其它的方面来进行解决。

translation: Therefore, everyone from entrepreneurs to housewives and to students, can upload your doubts to the cloud.
transcript: 所以如果说很多的这个企业主、家庭主妇，或者是，或者是这个每一个学生、每一个人都可以把你们感到疑惑的问题上传到云端。

translation: These questions will invoke all the people to think, to explore and to study together.
transcript: 这些问题吸引着所有的人来共同为它展开思考，展开探索，展开研究。

translation: I believe that "QCloud" is able to take shape with myriad questions in this era.
transcript: 我相信在这个时代就可以用无数的问题形成问题云。

translation: And these "QClouds" will eventually lead to the innovative practices of everyone.
transcript: 而这些问题云呢最终会变成每一个人的创新实践活动。

translation: At this moment, they are successfully transformed into an "Innovation storm", facilitating the growth of every student.
transcript: 这时候它就变成了创新雨，从而滋润每一个学生的成长。

translation: This is the core value of the "QCloud".
transcript: 这是我们的问题云的它的核心价值。

translation: The question is the "QCloud" will not certainly spontaneously transform into the "Innovative storm".
transcript: 当然问题云向创新雨的转化并不会天然形成。

translation: It requires that all educators to constantly sit hunched over desks and laptops.
transcript: 它需要我们教育工作者不断地为此付出劳动。

translation: I think in a Internet era, the following supports are essential to convert the "QCloud" into an innovative course for all students.
transcript: 所以我的觉我的想法在这个互联网时代，如果说要让问题云变成我们所有学生的一个创新课程来看，需要提供这些支持。

translation: First, it requires an open, free and online environment accessible to all users.
transcript: 比如它需要一个开放、免费、共享的和在线的一个环境。

translation: Secondly, it demands personalized content, specialized learning process and team-based growth.
transcript: 另外一个呢它需要一种个性化的内容，个别化的学程和团队化的生长。

translation: On this basis, the "Qcloud" also needs big data support, intelligent management, mobile Internet thinking and social network thinking, which are crucial guiding principles for the construction of "QCloud".
transcript: 第三个它需要一种大数据支持、智能化管理、移动与社交互联网的思维，这是我们进行问题云建设的一个非常重要的指导思想。

translation: On top of that, it should profit from the combination of science and artificial intelligence so that it could conduct emotional motivation and navigation, as well as favorable collaboration with the nature of children.
transcript: 除此之外呢，它也需要学习科学和人工智能的一种相互的结合，它能够进行呃情感的激励和导航，能够和孩子的天性进行合作。

translation: Rather thant just thinking about how to import knowledge into the students' brain more effectively.
transcript: 而不是仅仅想到把一个知识怎么样更好地、高效地传递到学生的脑子当中去。

translation: It certainly also requires an evaluation mechanism that supports the pratical resources.
transcript: 当然啦，它也需要一种评价机制，和现实资源的配套。

translation: In addition, we prefer to see the "QCloud" itself continuously evolve and develop based on the learner model, in a bid to fully tap the role of knowledge engineering in the evolution and development of knowledge itself.
transcript: 除此之外，我们更希望整个问题云本身能够基于学习者模型不断地进化和发展，让知识工程能够更好地促进知识本身的进化和发展。

translation: As a teacher, what I care more is about how to involve the students in the process of innovation in the form of course.
transcript: 作为老师来说呢，可能更关注的就是如何把创新的过程，给学生带来一种课程的体验。

translation: So the transformation of a "QCloud" to an "Innovation storm" requires everyone's continuous attention, joint exploration and concerted efforts to promote research and practices for the generation, development and resolution of questions.
transcript: 所以问题云向课程创新雨的转化呢，它需要大家持续关注，合力探索，然后共同地为问题的产生、问题的发展和问题的解决带动学习和实践活动。

translation: I hope that very educator here is willing to contribute his or her wisdom and strength to the development and implementation of the "QCloud".
transcript: 这样我们在座的每一位教育工作者一起为问题云的发展、问题云的实施，能够提供你们的贡献，哎贡献你们的智慧和力量。

translation: Then a large curriculum system will take shape throughout the entire society.
transcript: 这样我们全社会就会形成一种非常庞大的课程体系。

translation: Such curriculum system, ubiquitous, will drive the growth of every student.
transcript: 这种课程体系可能是无处不在的，然后它会滋润每一个学生的成长。

translation: At that time, the fate of every learner will be closely tied to the innovation of our whole nation.
transcript: 在那个时候我们每一个学生他的发展，就会跟我们整个民族的创新结合在一起。

translation: We yearn for that day to come as soon as possible and we hope that all of us can devote ourselves to the progress of the "QCloud".
transcript: 所以我们希望这一天早点在到来，希望大家能够共同为问题云的发展贡献自己的智慧。

translation: Thank you.
transcript: 谢谢大家。
